title: UFYB 123: Your Brain on Patriarchy
itunes:title: Your Brain on Patriarchy
description:
Discover the true impact of patriarchy on our brains through the concept of heuristics. I'm giving you the basics of how our brain unconsciously absorbs the messages we’re taught and creates reasoning shortcuts, and then how that ties into the patriarchy and our experience as people socialized as women.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/123
content:encoded:
Discover the true impact of patriarchy on our brains through the concept of heuristics. I'm giving you the basics of how our brain unconsciously absorbs the messages we’re taught and creates reasoning shortcuts, and then how that ties into the patriarchy and our experience as people socialized as women.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/123
itunes:subtitle: What heuristics are and why our brains develop them.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
